author: Natasha Lomas
title: EU privacy body urges anonymization of location data for COVID-19 tracking
description: The European Data Protection Board (EDPB) has published guidance for the use of location data and contacts tracing tools intended to mitigate the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic. Europe’s data protection framework wraps around all such digital interventions, …
content:
The European Data Protection Board (EDPB) has published guidance for the use of location data and contacts tracing tools intended to mitigate the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic.
Europe’s data protection framework wraps around all such digital interventions,… [+10216 chars]
